review: This is the greatest invention since TV's!! goodbye cable!
author: luvbronze

review: Very happy with my purchase. Highly recommended!
author: Tony

review: The Fire TV stick is really convenient for watching Netflix and Amazon Prime and it has a nice, user-friendly interface. The only thing that makes me regret my purchase is that there are no apps for Networks such as ABC and CW yet. I have read that there will be some eventually, but I watch shows on the Networks more often than Netflix so it would be nice if I could use one device for everything. Other than that, it's a good product!
author: Ashley

review: Amazing product at a great price.
author: doylehead69 "doylehead69"

review: Love it, Love it, Love it !!!!
author: A. L. Cox

review: Fantastic little device you can take anywhere with you!
author: Boxer1

review: So easy to install a monkey could do it. Really user friendly. Fast download speed. Fun games. I downloaded HBO and Showtime apps and they work really well. The remote it comes with is small would be easy to loose, so I'd recommend downloading the remote app. The voice control on the app is great. Love this product.
author: Amazon Customer
